Type Parameters:

All Implemented Interfaces:
CSVExportable
public class CurveTimeSeriesMatrixAdapter<T extends TimePoint>
extends Matrix

A wrapper of CurveTimeSeries that exposes the Matrix interface, to enable matrix arithmetic on curve time series

Author:
Luigi Sgro
